price: او خاص په اختیار د الله کې دي هغه څه چې په اسمانونو او زمكه كې دي، ټول هغه ته غاړه اېښودونكي دي.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
